# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

We are committed to ensuring the security of our project. Below are the versions of **Windows-Hotkey-for-iFlyVoice** that are currently being supported with security updates.

| Version | Supported          |
| ------- | ------------------ |
| 4.0.x   | :white_check_mark: |
| < 4.0   | :x:                |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

We take all security bugs in **Windows-Hotkey-for-iFlyVoice** seriously. We appreciate your efforts and responsible disclosure and will make every effort to acknowledge your contributions.

To report a security vulnerability, please use the [private vulnerability reporting feature on GitHub](https://github.com/chriskyfung/Agile-Win-Hotkey-for-iFlyVoice/security/advisories/new).

This will allow us to assess the risk and make a fix available before the vulnerability is publicly disclosed.

### What to Include

When reporting a vulnerability, please provide the following information:

- A clear and descriptive title.
- A detailed description of the vulnerability, including steps to reproduce it.
- The version of **Windows-Hotkey-for-iFlyVoice** you are using.
- Any relevant screenshots, code snippets, or logs.
- Your assessment of the vulnerability's impact.

We will coordinate with you on a timeline for releasing a fix and public disclosure. We ask that you do not disclose the vulnerability publicly until a fix is available.
